description: Police say a man in his 60s was pronounced dead in Stathern Lane, Harby, Melton Mowbray, on Monday.
title: Appeal after motorcyclist dies in crash
title_page: Harby: Appeal after motorcyclist dies in crash - BBC News
maintext:
Police are appealing for witnesses after a motorcyclist died in a crash in Leicestershire.
A member of the public came across the collision in Stathern Lane, Harby, Melton Mowbray, at 14:44 GMT on Monday.
Police said the motorcyclist, a man in his 60s, had come off a silver-coloured Honda motorcycle.
The incident may have happened earlier in the day, before the report was received, the force added.
Officers from the serious collision investigation unit are carrying out inquiries to establish the "full circumstances of the incident".
